item.title: 2025 Reading List
item.description:
A curated list of great books I have read this year.

  • The Recruiter: A Rick Carter Novel by Gregg Podolski
  • The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck by Mark Manson

  • Beasts of Extraordinary Circumstance by Ruth Emmie Lang
  • Your Inner Fish by Neil Shubin

item.title: ARTE (AWS Red Team Expert) Review
item.description:
Hi Everyone! I recent passed the ARTE (AWS Red Team Expert) certification and I wanted to write a short blurb on the course, the exam, and the entire experience. As with most things I say, these thoughts are my own and donâ€™t necessarily reflect those of my employer, HackTricks, my religion, or anybody/anything else.

Background: I am a pentester and have done cloud reviews before so some topics were a review for me. Additionally, I have the pentester mindset so I came into the course with the ability to enumerate well, think critically, and know when I am going down a rabbit hole.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Howdy! This is my little corner of the internet where I post about things. I’m not very good at keeping this updated, but I do cool things sometimes and I like to talk about them in case other people find them cool. I hope you find something cool here. If not, check back again later. Thanks!

item.title: Markdown Samples
item.description:
This is a sample post intended to test the followings:

  • A different post author.
  • Table of contents.
  • Markdown content rendering.
  • Math rendering.
  • Emoji rendering.

Markdown Syntax Rendering

Headings

The following HTML <h1>â€”<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest.

H1

H2

H3

H4

H5
H6

item.title: Rich Content
item.description:
This sample post tests the followings:

  • Category, sub-category nesting in the sidebar.
  • Hero image and other images are in images folder inside this post directory.
  • Different media rendering like image, tweet, YouTube video, Vimeo video etc.

item.description:
This is a sample post intended to test the followings:
